Welcome=
 to the Official IPAA Nominations site. This is a new venture

can join, it is F=
REE, you can showcase your work, network with others,
create projects with =

te yourselves, and promote your books,

Paranormal! Networking and helping others in a hau=
nting or a Mufon
watch, the ideas are endless!

We are working hard to find=
 sponsorships and unfortunately this 1st
annual event, donations are requir=
ed to help offset the awards. Any

tly appreciated.

All nominees, will become featured members. The donations=
 are good

le
for all to participate and enjoy ALL YOUR hard work!

e Best from IPAA

<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" ><tr><td valign="top" style="font: inherit;"><DIV>Who is IPAA and why am I receiving this information with a link for me to click on?</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>I would prefer not to receive these kinds of invitations through this group.  I usually get enough ads as it is without getting them enclosed in messages from groups I belong to. In the past I have received invitations sent directly to my email address and read them when it is convenient for me to take EXTRA time to read them.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Please don't make me hesitate to open EVP-ITC messages.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Thank you.</DIV>
